Articles.Content:
I would like to create my own mods; the only problem is I don't know where to start. I am reaching out to the community for some advice in modeling and config files. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

P.S. If a thread already exists for this topic, I appologize in advance.

As you may note, there is a whole section of the forum ("Modelling and Texturing Discussion") about the subject, plenty of help (and helpful modellers look there and are able to help further, in case you still can't find what you need in one of the many threads already opened). Of course your topic was moved in there too, as it is where it belongs.
The Modeling Development Links Compilation thread would be a good place to start. It has all the the tools and tutorials to get modders started.
